content: Met with a former colleague who introduced me to a quant firm looking for talent. Submitted my application, now waiting for a response.
I'm attending a seminar on AI in finance next week. Hoping to gain insights and maybe connect with potential employers or partners.
The seminar was insightful. Made some connections and got an interview lined up with the quant firm. Fingers crossed for this opportunity.
Interview went well! They're impressed with my blockchain trading idea. Now, I'm preparing a more detailed pitch for the next round.
Received feedback on my trading strategy from a peer. Integrating their suggestions, which feels like fine-tuning a piano for the perfect sound.
Finally, got an offer from the quant firm! Negotiating terms now. This could be the big break I've been working towards.
As the year ends, I'm reflecting on how much I've learned from the challenges I faced. Ready to start at the quant firm next month. Here's to new beginnings and continued growth.
